card_text: Target 1 Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Monster on the field; return that face-up monster to the Extra Deck, then, based on its card type, you can Special Summon 1 appropriate monster from either GY to your field.$N●Fusion: Monster with the same Attribute.$N●Synchro: Monster with a lower Level.$N●Xyz: Monster with the same Level as its Rank.$N●Link: Monster with the same Type.$NYou can only activate 1 "Starry Dragon's Cycle" per turn.
